content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
I would like data related to:
1) How much money in revenue the city council made on outdoor advertising in 2023.
2) A list of locations of all outdoor advertising currently owned by the city, with a delineation of which are digital advertising.
3) A list of the companies that currently buy outdoor advertising on property owned by Sheffield city council.
4) How much money in revenue the city council made specifically on digital outdoor advertising in 2023.
Yours faithfully,
Rei Eden
